page.description: Specify the 'step' amount, the discrete amount by which the List is scrolled. You can specify a value in pixels, or a percentage (e.g. 100%). WHen you specify a percentage, the percentage is of the 'viewport' size. For example, if the 'viewport' in which the List is displayed is 300px wide, then setting the snap size to 100% is the same as setting it to 300px.
